text: He imana vali'o! Jisa vele tusi' nase vica hovo tam namaza de nere na ja'u, ithom taka ki samajho jo tusim kahide ho, na usa samem jadom isanana di lora hove, para raha calade ho'e, ithom taka ki isanana kara la'u. Jekara tuhanu ko'i bimari hove jam tusim safara vica hovo jam tuhade vicom ko'i gusalakhane de sathana vicom ave jam tusim auratam ve kola ga'e hovo phira tuhanu pani na mile phira tusim sapha miti (tayamuma) nala cihara ate hatha mala lavo. Apane cihare ate hatham da masaha (chuha) kara la'u besaka alaha rahimata karana vala hai mu'afa karana vala hai
